type.name: org.gradle.api.internal.PropertiesTransformer
type.description: Transformer implementation to support modification of Properties objects.

method.name: addAction
method.description:
Adds an action to be executed when properties are transformed.
param:action the action to add

method.name: transform
method.description:
Transforms a properties object. This will modify the original.
param:original the properties to transform

returns:the transformed properties

method.name: transform
method.description:
Transforms a properties object and write them out to a stream. This will modify the original properties.
param:original the properties to transform
param:destination the stream to write the properties to
